short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create product polls for your shopping decisions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛍️ Struggling to choose between products? BuyerBot turns shopping decisions into fun, interactive polls! Create a poll from any products online and your friends can vote with a swipe!

Key Features:

💥 Add products from ANY website to your decision list
💥 Create engaging Tinder-style swipe polls
💥 Share polls easily with friends and family
💥 Get instant feedback on your shopping choices
💥 Track voting results in real-time
💥 Organize products by category or occasion

Perfect For:

⚡️ Shopping for big purchases
⚡️ Gift selection
⚡️ Fashion choices
⚡️ Home decor decisions
⚡️ Tech gadget comparisons
⚡️ Group buying decisions

How It Works:

🌟 Browse any online store and add products to your list
🌟 Create a swipe poll in seconds
🌟 Share your poll link with friends
🌟 Watch as votes help you make the perfect choice!

Why BuyerBot?

✓ Universal Compatibility - Works with all major shopping sites
✓ Quick Setup - Install and start creating polls in 48 seconds
✓ User-Friendly Interface - Simple, intuitive design
✓ Zero Ads - Clean, distraction-free experience

Never make a shopping decision alone again! Install BuyerBot and turn shopping into a social experience.
